description.displayText:
Angela helped me through a move and provided assistance in my new home.  

In preparation of our move, she helped me organize and sort through papers and things and discard many items.  She helped me create a system for addressing existing papers and ones that would come in the future.  Most of all, she provided me with the support and structure I needed to get through the task at hand.

In our new home, Angela has helped me implement the system and re-evaluate my needs to further simplify the process.  

Angela has been very good at listening to my needs and providing the direction I need.  She has been prepared with ideas and resources for my specific situation.  I'm always amazed at how much I can accomplish with her assistance!

Teresa
